channel.title: Connection problems* please help!
channel.description: hi, im w4rfac3 and i have a server. but the problem is, noone else but me can connect to it. i have a no-ip that works, and iv'e port forwarded, my server runs, but no body else can connect.. i'd appresiate it, if anyone could please help thanks. w4rf4c3 :rolleyes:[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 20, 2008, 04:40:09 pm[/size][hr]can anyone help me, can anyone help me resolve my proble, ifso olease tell me. i'd appreshiate it greatly :)

no pk, my server is the same my wont work ive had for over 1year without this ive allways updated my no-ip, redownload utorrent + no-ip, still doesent work…

item.title: Connection problems* please help!
item.dc:creator: @Pk_Lord_Pker Pk Lord Pker
item.description:
@Pk_Lord_Pker wrote:

no one can connect , that means you didnt portforward correct.!! goto : http://portforward.com , and find your router then choose a anygame ! then make sure you change the port your forwarding make it 43594 instead of the other port of the GAME!
-Have fun!

Read full topic
